newsitem.title: DUBAI: Saudi to open $1.7 billion power plant next week.
newsitem.headline: Saudi to open $1.7 billion power plant next week.

text.p: Saudi Arabia will inaugurate a 1,286-megawatt power plant in the capital Riyadh next week, the official Saudi Press Agency (SPA) said on Wednesday.

Quoting the Saudi Minister of Industry and Electricity Hashem bin Abdullah bin Hashem Yamani, it said the power station was built at a cost of 6.49 billion riyals ($1.73 billion) and its capacity could be increased to 1,800 megawatts in the future.
The plant is a part of huge Saudi projects to cope with a rising demand for electricity in the desert kingdom. ($1=3.75 Saudi riyals)
